<h3 id="X22758">X(22758) = HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd CIRCUMPERP TANGENTIAL AND JOHNSON</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(a^6-(b+c)*a^5-2*(b-c)^2*a^4+2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a^3+(b^4+c^4-2*(b^2-3*b*c+c^2)*b*c)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)^3*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2*b*c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22758) = 2*X(226)-3*X(5886) = 2*X(993)+X(18519) = 5*X(1656)-4*X(3822) = 2*X(3579)-3*X(21165) = 3*X(5603)-X(5905)</b>

<p>
X(22758) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 18519}, {3434, 6938}<br>
X(22758) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3, 993), (55, 6914)<br>
X(22758) = complement of X(12115)<br>
X(22758) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 7330, 5887), (2, 104, 10269), (3, 355, 11499), (3, 5790, 1376), (3, 18518, 6796), (3, 18525, 11500), (4, 2975, 11249), (8, 6906, 11248), (10, 5450, 3), (21, 944, 10267), (958, 12114, 3), (5267, 6796, 3), (5790, 18515, 3), (11249, 18761, 4), (22759, 22760, 1)<br>
